com.rift.coad.lib.bean
Class TransactionBeanCache

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.bean.TransactionBeanCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cache, javax.transaction.xa.XAResource
public class TransactionBeanCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cache, javax.transaction.xa.XAResource

This object is responsible for managing the transaction bean cache.
